summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, expressing a willingness to host individuals named Schwartz and Cutler for a meal. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended for the recipient only.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing hosting others at his house.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein.

persons.name: Schwartz
persons.context: Schwartz is mentioned as someone Epstein would host for breakfast or lunch.

persons.name: Cutler
persons.context: Cutler is mentioned alongside Schwartz as someone Epstein would host.

connections.description: Epstein is communicating with Staley regarding hosting others, indicating a social connection.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein expresses a willingness to host Schwartz and Cutler for a meal.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
